verse.name: v1
v2
v3
verse.lines: In Him, it is ordained to raise a temple to Jehovah's praise composed of all the saints, who own no Savior but the "Living Stone."

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: View the vast building, see it rise; the work how great! the plan how wise! O wondrous fabric, pow'r unknown that rests it on the "Living Stone."

verse.name: v5
